overview:
Bob Ghoorah is currently an adviser and investor for numerous startups.

Over the course of his career, Mr. Ghoorah has worked with some of the most innovative companies in Silicon Valley. He has served in various legal, operational, and financial roles at Ning, Opsware, and Loudcloud where he worked directly with leading technology entrepreneurs Marc Andreessen and Ben Horowitz to create industry defining companies. Previously, he was an attorney with Wilson, Sonsini, Goodrich, & Rosati and Orrick, Herrington, & Sutcliffe.

Mr. Ghoorah earned a J.D. from Duke University School of Law, and a B.A. from Colgate University.
